name: Shahmeer Gull
summary: AI Engineer specializing in fine-tuning LLMs, RAG, and LangChain for production-ready solutions. Skilled in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-Learn, with expertise in API design, cloud deployment, and integrating AI models using FastAPI and MERN stack. Experienced with version control, testing, and CI/CD, ensuring scalable, high-performance AI applications. Certified in AI for Public Health, Fundamentals of AI Agents, Generative AI, and LLM Architecture.

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
description: Contributed to AI-driven solutions using LLMs, RAG, and automation technologies.
Built GPT-based chatbots for SaaS, real estate, and e-commerce using LangChain and ChromaDB.
Created cold email generator and document summarization system.
Improved ML/DL models to enhance chatbot responses and user experience.
Preprocessed conversational data, extracted relevant features, and evaluated model performance.
Built and fine-tuned models using PyTorch and Scikit-Learn for intent classification and response generation.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed responsive frontends using React.js and optimized performance.
Built dashboards and data visualization components with senior engineers.
Developed and styled responsive front-end interfaces using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated APIs and enhanced user experience with dynamic, interactive components.
Collaborated with team to maintain code quality and implement UI improvements.

projects.title: MarkVista – AI-Powered Crypto Prediction & Risk Management Platform
description: Developed ML prediction models for crypto price prediction with real-time market data.
Engineered user-configurable risk profiles to manage portfolio risk dynamically.
Integrated broker APIs for automated trading execution with responsive risk controls.
Visualized analytics through a dynamic portfolio dashboard.
Built secure infrastructure and simulated community Q&A.
Streamlined user workflows into a unified interface.

projects.title: Private Document Summarization with RAG, LangChain, and LLMs
description: Utilized IBM Watsonx.ai, LangChain, and Hugging Face Embeddings for document summarization.

projects.title: RAG-Based Content Evaluation for Children's Media
description: Implemented RAG-based evaluation using PyTorch, BERT, and Hugging Face.

projects.title: Air Quality Analysis & Modeling – Bogotá Pollution Data
description: Cleaned multiyear pollution, weather & location data from public sources.
Analyzed trends using correlation, time series, and geospatial visualizations.
Developed a hybrid model combining KNN and neural networks for robust pollution estimation.
Visualized results with GeoPandas, Folium, and a Jupyter dashboard.

projects.title: Cold Email Generator for Business Outreach
description: Developed a cold email generator using Groq API and LangChain.

certifications.name: Fundamentals of AI Agents Using RAG and LangChain
Generative AI Advance Fine-Tuning for LLMs
Generative AI and LLMs: Architecture and Data Preparation
